MultiSelectInput
description: A component for multiple selection in drop-down list

name: SingleSelectInput
description: A component for a single item selection in drop-down list

name: src/common/PipeTransformModule.js
HideClass
description: The HideClass pipe, hides entities of given class.

name: transform
description: The transform function implements the HideClass pipe.

params.name: items
params.description: the list of resources to filter

name: FilterBy
description: The FilterBy pipe, filters items to select those that contain a given string in a given field.

params.name: items
params.description: the list of resources to filter

name: SetToArray
description: The SetToArray pipe, converts a given set to an array.

params.name: items
params.description: the set of resources to convert to an array

name: OrderBy
description: The OrderBy pipe, sorts given list according to the given sort mode

params.name: items
params.description: the set of resources to convert to an array

name: MapToOptions
description: The MapToOptions pipe, maps entities into objects for drop-down lists

params.name: items
params.description:
the array of resources to convert to an array of objects
with fields "id" and "text".

name: MapToCategories
description: The MapToCategories pipe, maps entities into categorized objects for drop-down lists

params.name: items
params.description:
the array of resources to convert to an array of objects
with fields "text" and "children".

name: PipeTransformModule
description: The PipeTransformModule module, exports open-physiology helper pipes

name: src/common/toolbars/ToolbarSettingsModule.js
ToolbarPropertySettings
description: The ToolbarPropertySettings component, offers a button to choose checkboxes with configuration properties from the drop-down menu.

params.name: options
params.description:
the list of properties to choose from, i.e., item types (resource classes)
  A configuration option is an Object with the visible label and the initial value, i.e.,

params.name: transform
params.description: an optional function that can be used to transform option appearance

emits.description: selectionChanged  - a user changed the value of a checkbox

name: ToolbarSettingsModule
description: The ToolbarSettingsModule module, offers the ToolbarPropertySettings component.

TestClass
description: The TestClass is awesome!

name: getColor

params.name: str
params.description: the inpit string

name: getPropertyLabel
description: The getPropertyLabel function replaces field name with human readable labels

params.name: option
params.description: the open-physiology resource field name

name: getClassLabel
description: The getClassLabel function provides an human readable label for open-physiology class

params.name: clsName
params.description: the resource class name

name: getResourceIcon
description: The getResourceIcon function provides an icon for a given resource

unknown.tagValue: {DataURI} - the icon for the resource class

params.name: item
params.description: the resource

return.description: the icon for the resource class

name: src/components/MeasurableGeneratorModule.js
MeasurableGenerator

params.description: a resource, typically, lyph, which inherits measurables from its type

emits.description: closed - a user closed the modal window

name: MeasurableGeneratorModule
description: The MeasurableGeneratorModule module, offers the MeasurableGenerator component.

name: src/components/TemplateValueModule.js
TemplateValueComponent
description:
The TemplateValueComponent, provides fields for editing typedDistribution schema:
  'value': { type: 'number' },
  'min':   { type: 'number' },
  'max':   { type: 'number' },
  'mean':  { type: 'number' },
  'std':   { type: 'number' },
  'class': { type: 'string', required: true }

name: TemplateValueModule
description: The TemplateValueModule module, offers the TemplateValueComponent component.

content:
import Rx from 'rxjs';

name: src/panels/AbstractResourceList.js
AbstractResourceList
description: The AbstractResourceList class implements methods common for upper level and nested resource lists.

params.name: caption
params.description: the header of the list

params.name: items
params.description: the list of displayed resources

params.name: types
params.description: the list of displayed item types (resource classes)

params.name: options
params.description:
an optional object with configuration options for the list appearance, i.e.,
  {headersOnly: false, readOnly: false, sortToolbar: true, filterToolbar: true, showActive: false}

params.name: selectedItem
params.description: the selected resource

params.name: highlightedItem
params.description: the highlighted resource

emits.description: added                 - a new item added to the list
removed               - an item removed from the list
updated               - an item in the list has been updated

name: src/panels/HighlightService.js
HighlightService
description: The HighlightService service notifies nested components about currently highlighted item

name: src/panels/ItemHeader.js
ItemHeader
description:
The ItemHeader component configures accordion header for a given resource. The header consists of a left side icon that indicates whether
the accordion tab is open or closed, the title formed from the resource's id and name, and the right hand icon that shows
the class of the resource. The is an option to include to the header a checkbox with an icon to mark the resource as active.

params.name: item
params.description: the resource for which header will be created

params.name: options
params.description: an optional object with boolean options to configure header appearance, i.e., {showActive: true}

params.name: isOpen
params.description: a boolean flag to indicate whether the item editor panel is open to choose proper left side icon

params.name: isActive
params.description: a boolean flag to indicate whether the item is active to draw or not the 'eye open' icon

emits.description: activeItemChanged  - the item has been marked as active

name: src/panels/NestedResourceList.js
NestedResourceList
description:
The NestedResourceList component, provides functionality for editing lists of resources.
Inherits input parameters and emitted events from AbstractResourceList

params.name: possibleValues
params.description: the list of resources that can be added to the current list

name: src/panels/NestedResourceWidgetModule.js
NestedResourceWidget
description:
The NestedResourceWidget component, provides functionality for editing lists of entities.
Inherits input parameters and emitted events from AbstractResourceList

params.name: activeItem
params.description: the active item

name: src/panels/ResourcePanelModule.js
ResourcePanel
description: The ResourcePanel component, generates fields for editting properties of a given resource.

params.name: item
params.description: the resource to show or edit

name: src/test-app/app.js
TestApp
description: The TestComponent component, showing off the nested resource editor!

src/toolbars/ToolbarAddModule.js
ToolbarAdd
description: The ToolbarAdd component, offers a button to create a new resource from dropdown menu.

params.name: options
params.description: the list of item types (resource classes) to choose from

params.name: transform
params.description: an optional function that can be used to transform option appearance

name: ToolbarAddModule
description: The ToolbarAddModule module, offers the ToolbarAdd component.

name: src/toolbars/ToolbarCommandsModule.js
ToolbarCommands
description: The ToolbarCommands component, offers buttons to delete a resource, commit or rollback changes.

params.name: options
params.description:
a set of boolean options that indicate which buttons to show.
By default all three buttons are shown: {hideRemove: false, hideSave: false, hideRestore: false}

params.name: transform
params.description: an optional function that can be used to transform option appearance

emits.description: removed   - a user pressed the button to delete the item
canceled  - a user pressed the button to cancel changes (rollback)
saved     - a user pressed the button to save changes (commit)

name: src/toolbars/ToolbarFilterModule.js
ToolbarFilter
description: The ToolbarFilter component, offers an input field to specify search string and a dropdown menu to choose properties to which the filter is applied.

params.name: filter
params.description: initial search string

params.name: options
params.description: item properties to filter

emits.description: applied                 - a user pressed the button to filter the list of resources

name: ToolbarFilterModule
description: The ToolbarFilterModule module, offers the ToolbarFilter component.

name: src/toolbars/ToolbarSortModule.js
ToolbarSort
description: The ToolbarSort component, offers buttons to trigger sorting in ascending and descending order

params.name: options
params.description: item properties that define a sorting sort, e.g., ["Id", "Name", "Class"]

emits.description: sorted                  - a user pressed the button to filter the list of resources

name: ToolbarSortModule
description: The ToolbarSortModule module, offers the ToolbarSort component.
